achievements.label: Numen: That Old Lost Music
achievements.descriptionunlocked: Every song ever sung still lingers in wind and echo, untouched by the demands of Eternity...

achievements.label: Numen: A Final Understanding
achievements.descriptionunlocked: Eternity and History cannot be reconciled. Freedom cannot be perfection - not unless we understand the paradox of the eternal ending...

achievements.label: Numen: Back into Balance
achievements.descriptionunlocked: When the travelling Carapace-kinds passed beyond the wave and the sky, they made arrangements for their return...

achievements.label: Numen: Three Rules
achievements.descriptionunlocked: If we know those deepest rules, we know what even the Chancel and the Calyptra may not do...

achievements.label: Numen: Loopholes
achievements.descriptionunlocked: When Eternity came into the world, certain prudent powers arranged loopholes. Those loopholes may open again...

achievements.label: Numen: The Sun's Weakness
achievements.descriptionunlocked: The Sun's sins and the Sun's scars are our salvation. There are Histories where they will trap us...

achievements.label: Numen: the Bells of Ys
achievements.descriptionunlocked: Ys, by her arts, found the strike-tone that shakes the Hours. A bell cast with this secret could speak the Ys-note...

achievements.label: Numen: the Great Counterfeit
achievements.descriptionunlocked: The Sun-in-Splendour and the Forge of the Days could not be joined. But Sunset Celia and the Swan King could...

achievements.label: Numen: Weaving the World
achievements.descriptionunlocked: The Histories, they say, are braided like hair - or tangled like roots. What is the shape of that knot...?

achievements.label: Numen: an Irresistible Feast
achievements.descriptionunlocked: Hunger made Worms of Dragons. But without the savour-secret of the Carapace, their hunger would not have been sufficient...

achievements.label: Numen: a Merciless Alteration
achievements.descriptionunlocked: The fundamental flaw; the irresistible shortcut; the hate that heats; the change that mars; the scar that opens...

achievements.label: Numen: Inescapable Confinement
achievements.descriptionunlocked: There's only one place you're safe from Eternity and History, and it's not a place anyone would want to be...

achievements.label: Numen: the Paths of the Sun
achievements.descriptionunlocked: The Sun has charted his Paths - paths beyond walls and woods and Bounds. When we are ready, all of us will enter Eternity...
